summary: While on a summer trip with her friends, Megan begins to feel the presence of Sophie, her twin sister who recently committed suicide.
cast: Elisabeth Harnois|Shawn Ashmore|Hilarie Burton|Amanda Seyfried|Tyler Hoechlin|Matt O'Leary|R. Lee Ermey|Lisa Arnold|Lyle Brocato|David Dahlgren|Jenna Hildebrand|Mark Krasnoff|Deejay Buras|Jacob Hamil|Cliff Johnson|Jennifer Ramirez|Johnny Cley Rivers|Gary Michael Smith
title: Solstice
